events.event_name: Bank of England Interest Rate Signal
events.description: The Bank of England signaled potential interest rate cuts if inflation continues to decline.

events.event_name: Rio Tinto and Glencore Merger Collapse
events.description: Reports indicated that merger discussions between mining giants Rio Tinto and Glencore have ended.
Heightened geopolitical friction between the US and Iran impacting commodity markets.

facts.fact_text: The FTSE 100 reached approximately 10,330 points on Friday.

evidences.evidence_text: London’s FTSE 100 edged up to around 10,330 points on Friday

facts.fact_text: Shares in Barclays, NatWest Group, and Lloyds increased by 1.1% to 1.9%.

evidences.evidence_text: shares in Barclays, NatWest Group and Lloyds rising between 1.1% and 1.9%

facts.fact_text: RELX shares fell by more than 4% and Experian dropped by 2.9%.

evidences.evidence_text: RELX slid more than 4% and Experian dropped 2.9%

claims.claim_text: AI is expected to disrupt the business models of data and software companies.

evidences.evidence_text: growing concerns that AI could disrupt their business models

claims.claim_text: The revelation of Peter Mandelson's ties to Jeffrey Epstein poses a challenge to Keir Starmer's leadership.

evidences.evidence_text: posing a fresh challenge to Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s leadership

evidence.evidence_text: signals from the Bank of England on Thursday that interest rates could be lowered
precious metal prices climbed amid heightened US–Iran tensions
data and software stocks underperformed amid growing concerns that AI could disrupt their business models
Domestic political uncertainty added to caution after emails revealed the extent of UK ambassador Peter Mandelson’s ties to Jeffrey Epstein
